p: Ruta graveolens L. (Rutaceae), commonly known as rue, has been reported to have medicinal properties against aching pain, eye problems, rheumatism, and dermatitis. 106 Skimmianine ( 87), isolated from R. graveolens L., was injected into mice (5.0 mg/kg) and found to alleviate carrageenan-induced acute inflammation, decrease the mRNA levels of TNF-Î± and IL-6, and reduce PGE2 and NO levels, COX-2 and 5-lipoxygenase activities, neutrophil infiltration, lipid peroxidation, and associated oxidative stress in the paw tissue. 71
